Package Menu

Provides the views and models used during the Menu state of the game.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AccountCreationPopUp The Account Creation popup menu is called when the user chooses to create a new account in the login menu.
AccountOptionsPopUp The AccountOptionsPopUp is called when the user selects Modify Account Information in the main menu.
GameOverMenu This class is used to represent the options available to the player when the game is over or completed.
InGameMenu This class is used to represent the options available to the player when the game is paused.
LeaderboardMenu The LeaderboardMenu class displays the high scores of the top ten users.
LevelSelectionPopUp Defines the logic and elements necessary to enable the user to play an unlocked stage.
LoadGamePopUp The LoadGamePopUp is accessed through the main menu and allows the user to load a previously saved game.
LoginMenu The very first menu that loads up when the program is started that gives the user the option to either login or create a new account.
LoginPopup The login popup is called when the user chooses to login from the login menu.
MainMenu This class is used to represent the options available after the user logs in.
MenuManager The MenuManager class is used primarily to navigate between different menu states.
MenuTemplate The MenuTemplate class is used by other menus for their appearance.
SaveGamePopUp The SaveGamePopUp is accessed through the in game menu and allows the user to save his current progress in the game.
 

Enum Summary
MenuState Defines the menu types present in the game.
 

Package Menu Description

Provides the views and models used during the Menu state of the game.
